articles.author: Sarah Magliocco
articles.title: Hundreds of passengers impacted as Aer Lingus cancels 11 more flights to Spain, France and America - RSVP Live
articles.description: The cancellations include flights to Spain, France and America, and a number of different reasons have been given as airports reach breaking point across Europe
articles.content:
Aer Lingus has cancelled 11 more flights today and tomorrow as airlines and airports across Europe continue to be impacted by disruption caused by a number of contributing factors.
